title: Native Foods - Westwood
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Fast food, Take-out, Catering, Fusion
description: In May 2012 this Westwood vegan restaurant merged its previous 2 adjacent storefronts into one expanded location. Offer seating on 2 floors. Its original menu features salads, veggie burgers, rice and noodle bowls, vegan desserts, chai with soymilk, organic coffee, and more. In-house tempeh and seitan (wheat meat). Order at the counter, and food is brought to your table. Street parking.
